{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Planex |model=MZK-W04N |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin=B000UK76OS |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/02/2007 |manuf_country=China |manuf=Edimax |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=NDD9577580705 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT1310A |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Edimax EW-7758Mn |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2860 |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2820 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8305SC |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=Admin |default_pass=0000 |oui=00:90:CC |oui_eth=00:90:CC }} {{TagLine|802.11n Wireless Broadband Router}} :[http://www.planex.net/product/router/mzk-w04n.htm Product page]{{â€¢}}[http://www.planex.net/spec/router/MZK-W04N_Spec_Eng_v1.0.pdf Datasheet] *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/doku.php?id=oldwiki:openwrtdocs:hardware:pci:mzk_w04n On the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :[[Ralink]] RT1310A CPU based, 4MB RAM, 32MB Flash, :[[Ralink]] RT2860RT Wi-Fi, [[Realtek]] RTL8305SC Switch *[https://www.amazon.com/gp/search?tag=wiki085-20&keywords=Planex_MZK-W04N On '''Amazon'''] ===Specifications=== Additional specifications, per the datasheet, follow... *Transmit Power **802.11b: 16~18 dBm **802.11g: 14~16 dBm **802.11n: 11~13 dBm *Receiver Sensitivity **802.11b: -80 dBm **802.11g: -70 dBm **802.11n: -70 dBm *Dimensions: [[Dimensions::34 mm x 191 mm x 155 mm|191 mm (H) x 34 mm (W) x 155 mm (D)]] *Weight (without antennas): [[Weight::434 g]] ===Firmware=== ====binwalk dump==== 
$ binwalk MZK-W04N_FW_v1.39_CE.bin

DECIMAL         HEX             DESCRIPTION
------------------------------------------------
0               0x0             CSYS header, little endian,  size: 131072
20              0x14            uImage header, header size: 64 bytes, 
   header CRC: 0x172BE5FD, created: Mon Dec 15 01:05:15 2008, 
   image size: 871208 bytes, Data Address: 0x40008000, 
   Entry Point: 0x40008000, data CRC: 0x7326EAE1, OS: Linux, 
   CPU: ARM, image type: OS Kernel Image, compression type: 
   bzip2, image name: "Linux-2.6.17"
84              0x54            bzip2 compressed data, block size = 900k
1048576         0x100000        Squashfs filesystem, little endian, 
   version 3.0, size: 2713551 bytes,  578 inodes, 
   blocksize: 65536 bytes, created: Mon Dec 15 01:04:56 2008
===See also=== * [[Planex MZK-W04G]] - [[Star]] STR9102 (250MHz) - LAN, USB, Mini PCI (WiFi) [http://www.nerv.org/~ryo/d/2009/2009091600.html nerv] __NOTOC__
